thread.section_title: MyAirbags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyAirbags | myairbags.com
thread.title: Mimi Claire Sanders
thread.title_full: MyAirbags reviewed by Mimi Claire Sanders

author: Mimi Claire Sanders
title: Mimi Claire Sanders
text: After having 2 gauges on my instrument cluster go bad, I sent it out to MyAirbags for a repair/rebuild. The process was amazing simple. They provided a video with easy instructions to follow. I boxed it up and mailed it USPS on Monday afternoon. They received it Wednesday and shipped it that same day -- I had it back in my mailbox on Friday! My instrument panel arrived nicely packaged and very clean. It only took 5 minutes to install and it looks and works like brand new. Their price was also very reasonable when I compared them to other shops. I highly recommend MyAirbags and I will continue to use them for any future needs that may come up!
